monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Avoids Monster encounters - Opens magical vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Arcane Barrage
skills.description: 10 x 65% (650%) magical damage (neutral) Shield self for 1 x (750 + 200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion
skills.description: 5 x 80% (400%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 2 Buffs from target

skills.name: Arcane Diffusion Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 100% (500%) magical damage (neutral) Removes 3 Buffs from target

skills.name: Aurora's Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (300 + 25% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Buff Corruption
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness reduces the strength of Buffs and beneficial Stacks on enemies by 6%.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Double Strike
skills.description: On each hit, there's a 10% chance to trigger another hit with the same base damage. (Cannot trigger again on Double Strike hits)

skills.name: Earth Allegiance
skills.description: Converts the element of all Neutral attacks to Earth. Earth attacks ignore Earth resistance.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Encapsulate
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (40 + 15% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (80% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (50 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (100% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (60 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (120% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (70 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (150% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 9 x (90 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Initial Weakness
skills.description: Apply Weakness (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Max Mana value.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mass Restore
skills.description: Heal all for (200 + 70% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (175 + 40% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 50% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Multi Weakness
skills.description: Aura: Weakness (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Poisoning Soil
skills.description: Every Earth attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Primal Hex
skills.description: Aura: Every damaging hit, heal and shield by Nature and Mage Monsters in the party has a 4% chance to apply a random Debuff on an enemy.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Restoring Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (50 + 15% Defense) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (60 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (75 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (100 + 15% Defense) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield target for 7 x (125 + 15% Defense) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Spore
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Cloud
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Cloud Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Cloud Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Nebula
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Supremacy
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Weakening Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Attack) Applies Weakness (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Weakening Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Attack) Applies Weakness (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

drops.name: Cookie Mushroom
drops.description: Increases damage, healing and shielding of this monster by 3%.
